languages.text: {n}Идира говорит тихо, ее голос дрожит.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, мне неизвестно о тайниках и секретах Леди Теодоры, но голоса... вдруг решили напомнить кое-что. Как-то мне довелось попробовать самое настоящее вино — им меня угостила Леди Теодора... То было не абы какое синтетическое пойло, а ее любимое. Она всегда пила этот золотистый напиток в своем дворце. "Пламя чистоты" — название глупое, но вкус, такой яркий и не похожий ни на что другое, я помню до сих пор..." {n}Грустно хмыкнув, Идира трясет головой.{/n} "Извините. Наверное, это неважно, но большего я попросту не знаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира говорит тихо, ее голос дрожит.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, мне неизвестно о тайниках и секретах леди Теодоры, но голоса... вдруг решили напомнить кое-что. Как-то мне довелось попробовать самое настоящее вино — им меня угостила Леди Теодора... То было не абы какое синтетическое пойло, а ее любимое. Она всегда пила этот золотистый напиток в своем дворце. "Пламя чистоты" — название глупое, но вкус, такой яркий и не похожий ни на что другое, я помню до сих пор..." {n}Грустно хмыкнув, Идира трясет головой.{/n} "Извините. Наверное, это неважно, но большего я попросту не знаю".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira speaks quietly, her voice trembling.{/n} "Lord Captain, I don't know anything about caches or Lady Theodora's secrets, but the voices... the voices have just reminded me about something. I was once given the chance to try some real wine — Lady Theodora gave me some... Not just any old synthetic booze, but her favourite plonk. She always drank it in her palace. It was golden in colour, and its name was Flame of Purity. A silly name, but the flavour was so intense and like nothing I'd ever tasted before or since..." {n}Sniffing sadly, Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Apologies. It's probably not important, but I don't know anything more than that."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира говорит тихо, ее голос дрожит.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, мне неизвестно о тайниках и секретах Леди Теодоры, но голоса... вдруг решили напомнить кое-что. Как-то мне довелось попробовать самое настоящее вино — им меня угостила Леди Теодора... То было не абы какое синтетическое пойло, а ее любимое. Она всегда пила этот золотистый напиток в своем дворце. "Пламя чистоты" — название глупое, но вкус, такой яркий и не похожий ни на что другое, я помню до сих пор..." {n}Грустно хмыкнув, Идира трясет головой.{/n} "Извините. Наверное, это неважно, но большего я попросту не знаю".

languages.text: {n}Idira habla con la voz baja y temblorosa.{/n} «Lord Capitán, no sé nada de escondrijos ni de los secretos de lady Theodora, pero las voces... las voces acaban de recordarme algo. Una vez tuve ocasión de probar vino de verdad; lady Theodora me ofreció un poco... Y no hablo de un bebedizo sintético; era su caldo favorito. Siempre lo bebía en su palacio. Era de color dorado, y se llamaba Llama de Pureza. Un nombre ridículo, pero su sabor era intenso y no se parecía a ningún otro que haya probado antes o después...». {n}Idira aspira por la nariz, entristecida, y menea la cabeza.{/n} «Discúlpeme. Probablemente no sea importante, pero es lo único que sé».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira speaks quietly, her voice trembling.{/n} "Lord Captain, I don't know anything about caches or Lady Theodora's secrets, but the voices... the voices have just reminded me about something. I was once given the chance to try some real wine — Lady Theodora gave me some... Not just any old synthetic booze, but her favourite plonk. She always drank it in her palace. It was golden in colour, and its name was Flame of Purity. A silly name, but the flavour was so intense and like nothing I'd ever tasted before or since..." {n}Sniffing sadly, Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Apologies. It's probably not important, but I don't know anything more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira habla con la voz baja y temblorosa.{/n} «Lord Capitán, no sé nada de escondrijos ni de los secretos de lady Theodora, pero las voces... las voces acaban de recordarme algo. Una vez tuve ocasión de probar vino de verdad; lady Theodora me ofreció un poco... Y no hablo de un bebedizo sintético; era su caldo favorito. Siempre lo bebía en su palacio. Era de color dorado, y se llamaba Llama de Pureza. Un nombre ridículo, pero su sabor era intenso y no se parecía a ningún otro que haya probado antes o después...». {n}Idira aspira por la nariz, entristecida, y menea la cabeza.{/n} «Discúlpeme. Probablemente no sea importante, pero es lo único que sé».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは声を震わせながら静かに口を開いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、隠し場所やレディ・シオドーラの秘密のことは何も知らないけれど、声を…声を聞いて、本物のワインを飲む機会があったことを思い出したわ。レディ・シオドーラが、あたいに少し分けてくれたの…そこらへんの人工酒とはひと味違う、彼女のお気に入りの安物ワインだった。いつも自分の宮廷で飲んでいたわ。黄金色で、確か『ピュリティの炎』という名前の酒だったはずよ。妙な名前だけれど味は強烈で、後にも先にもあれほどのものを味わったことはなかった…」{n}イディラは悲しそうに鼻をすすり、首を横に振った。{/n}「ごめんなさい。あまり意味のある情報なないかもしれないけど、それ以外のことはわからないの」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira speaks quietly, her voice trembling.{/n} "Lord Captain, I don't know anything about caches or Lady Theodora's secrets, but the voices... the voices have just reminded me about something. I was once given the chance to try some real wine — Lady Theodora gave me some... Not just any old synthetic booze, but her favourite plonk. She always drank it in her palace. It was golden in colour, and its name was Flame of Purity. A silly name, but the flavour was so intense and like nothing I'd ever tasted before or since..." {n}Sniffing sadly, Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Apologies. It's probably not important, but I don't know anything more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは声を震わせながら静かに口を開いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、隠し場所やレディ・シオドーラの秘密のことは何も知らないけれど、声を…声を聞いて、本物のワインを飲む機会があったことを思い出したわ。レディ・シオドーラが、あたいに少し分けてくれたの…そこらへんの人工酒とはひと味違う、彼女のお気に入りの安物ワインだった。いつも自分の宮廷で飲んでいたわ。黄金色で、確か『ピュリティの炎』という名前の酒だったはずよ。妙な名前だけれど味は強烈で、後にも先にもあれほどのものを味わったことはなかった…」{n}イディラは悲しそうに鼻をすすり、首を横に振った。{/n}「ごめんなさい。あまり意味のある情報なないかもしれないけど、それ以外のことはわからないの」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉的声音颤抖而低沉。{/n}“舰长大人，我不知道什么藏匿处，也不知道西奥多拉夫人的秘密，但那些声音……那些声音在提醒我某件事。我曾经品尝过真正的美酒，是西奥多拉夫人给我的……那不是普通的合成酒，而是她最喜欢的那种烈酒，她以前经常在宫殿里喝。那种酒的颜色是金色的，名字叫‘纯净之火’。名字很蠢，但味道却很香醇。无论是在那之前还是之后，我都再也没喝过那么好的酒……”{n}伊迪拉悲伤地抽着鼻子，然后摇摇头。{/n}“抱歉，这件事可能并不重要，但除此之外，别的事情我恐怕都不清楚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira speaks quietly, her voice trembling.{/n} "Lord Captain, I don't know anything about caches or Lady Theodora's secrets, but the voices... the voices have just reminded me about something. I was once given the chance to try some real wine — Lady Theodora gave me some... Not just any old synthetic booze, but her favourite plonk. She always drank it in her palace. It was golden in colour, and its name was Flame of Purity. A silly name, but the flavour was so intense and like nothing I'd ever tasted before or since..." {n}Sniffing sadly, Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Apologies. It's probably not important, but I don't know anything more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉的声音颤抖而低沉。{/n}“舰长大人，我不知道什么藏匿处，也不知道西奥多拉夫人的秘密，但那些声音……那些声音在提醒我某件事。我曾经品尝过真正的美酒，是西奥多拉夫人给我的……那不是普通的合成酒，而是她最喜欢的那种烈酒，她以前经常在宫殿里喝。那种酒的颜色是金色的，名字叫‘纯净之火’。名字很蠢，但味道却很香醇。无论是在那之前还是之后，我都再也没喝过那么好的酒……”{n}伊迪拉悲伤地抽着鼻子，然后摇摇头。{/n}“抱歉，这件事可能并不重要，但除此之外，别的事情我恐怕都不清楚。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Idira se fait basse et tremblante.{/n} « J'ignore tout des caches et des secrets de dame Théodora, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais les voix... elles viennent de me rappeler quelque chose. Une fois, j'ai eu l'occasion de goûter du véritable vin. C'est dame Théodora m'en a offert... Et pas une pauvre piquette synthétique, mais son picrate favori à la robe dorée, celui qu'elle buvait toujours dans son palais. La Flamme de pureté, qu'il s'appelait. Un nom idiot, mais son bouquet était intense et ne ressemblait à rien de ce que j'avais pu goûter... ou que j'ai goûté depuis. » {n}Elle secoue la tête en reniflant tristement.{/n} « Excusez-moi. Ça n'a sûrement aucune importance, mais c'est tout ce que je sais. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira speaks quietly, her voice trembling.{/n} "Lord Captain, I don't know anything about caches or Lady Theodora's secrets, but the voices... the voices have just reminded me about something. I was once given the chance to try some real wine — Lady Theodora gave me some... Not just any old synthetic booze, but her favourite plonk. She always drank it in her palace. It was golden in colour, and its name was Flame of Purity. A silly name, but the flavour was so intense and like nothing I'd ever tasted before or since..." {n}Sniffing sadly, Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Apologies. It's probably not important, but I don't know anything more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Idira se fait basse et tremblante.{/n} « J'ignore tout des caches et des secrets de dame Théodora, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais les voix... elles viennent de me rappeler quelque chose. Une fois, j'ai eu l'occasion de goûter du véritable vin. C'est dame Théodora m'en a offert... Et pas une pauvre piquette synthétique, mais son picrate favori à la robe dorée, celui qu'elle buvait toujours dans son palais. La Flamme de pureté, qu'il s'appelait. Un nom idiot, mais son bouquet était intense et ne ressemblait à rien de ce que j'avais pu goûter... ou que j'ai goûté depuis. » {n}Elle secoue la tête en reniflant tristement.{/n} « Excusez-moi. Ça n'a sûrement aucune importance, mais c'est tout ce que je sais. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira spricht leise und mit zittriger Stimme.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich weiß nichts über geheime Lager oder Lady Theodoras Geheimnisse, doch die Stimmen ... die Stimmen haben mich gerade an etwas erinnert. Ich hatte einmal die Gelegenheit, echten Wein zu kosten. Lady Theodora hat mir welchen gegeben ... Keinen synthetischen Alkohol, sondern ihr Lieblingsgesöff. Sie hat diesen Wein immer in ihrem Palast getrunken. Er war goldfarben und hieß Flamme der Reinheit. Alberner Name, aber der Geschmack war so intensiv und einzigartig, weder davor noch danach habe ich je so etwas gekostet ..." {n}Idira schnieft traurig und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Verzeiht. Es ist vermutlich nicht wichtig, doch mehr weiß ich nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira speaks quietly, her voice trembling.{/n} "Lord Captain, I don't know anything about caches or Lady Theodora's secrets, but the voices... the voices have just reminded me about something. I was once given the chance to try some real wine — Lady Theodora gave me some... Not just any old synthetic booze, but her favourite plonk. She always drank it in her palace. It was golden in colour, and its name was Flame of Purity. A silly name, but the flavour was so intense and like nothing I'd ever tasted before or since..." {n}Sniffing sadly, Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Apologies. It's probably not important, but I don't know anything more than that."

Ich hatte einmal die Gelegenheit, echten Wein zu kosten. Lady Theodora hat mir welchen gegeben ... Keinen synthetischen Alkohol, sondern ihr Lieblingsgesöff. Sie hat diesen Wein immer in ihrem Palast getrunken. Er war goldfarben und hieß Flamme der Reinheit. Alberner Name, aber der Geschmack war so intensiv und einzigartig, weder davor noch danach habe ich je so etwas gekostet ..." {n}Idira schnieft traurig und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Verzeiht. Es ist vermutlich nicht wichtig, doch mehr weiß ich nicht."

I was once given the chance to try some real wine — Lady Theodora gave me some... Not just any old synthetic booze, but her favourite plonk. She always drank it in her palace. It was golden in colour, and its name was Flame of Purity. A silly name, but the flavour was so intense and like nothing I'd ever tasted before or since..." {n}Sniffing sadly, Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Apologies. It's probably not important, but I don't know anything more than that."

languages.text: {n}İdira, titreyen bir sesle hafifçe konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, zulaya ya da Leydi Theodora'nın sırlarına dair bir bilgim yok ama sesler... Sesler bana az önce bir şeyi anımsattı. Bir vakitler sahici bir şarap tatma imkânı bulmuştum. Leydi Theodora ikram etmişti. Öyle eski üretim sentetik içkilerden değildi, Leydi'nin gözde şarabıydı. Sarayında her daim ondan içerdi. Altın renkliydi, adı Saflık Alevi'ydi. Adı tuhaf, farkındayım ama tadı yoğundu ve ne öncesinde ne de sonrasında boğazımdan geçen hiçbir şeye benzemiyordu." {n}Hüzünle burnunu çeken İdira, kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Kusuruma bakma. Muhtemelen önemsizdir. Ne yazık ki bundan başka bir şey bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira speaks quietly, her voice trembling.{/n} "Lord Captain, I don't know anything about caches or Lady Theodora's secrets, but the voices... the voices have just reminded me about something. I was once given the chance to try some real wine — Lady Theodora gave me some... Not just any old synthetic booze, but her favourite plonk. She always drank it in her palace. It was golden in colour, and its name was Flame of Purity. A silly name, but the flavour was so intense and like nothing I'd ever tasted before or since..." {n}Sniffing sadly, Idira shakes her head.{/n} "Apologies. It's probably not important, but I don't know anything more than that."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, titreyen bir sesle hafifçe konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, zulaya ya da Leydi Theodora'nın sırlarına dair bir bilgim yok ama sesler... Sesler bana az önce bir şeyi anımsattı. Bir vakitler sahici bir şarap tatma imkânı bulmuştum. Leydi Theodora ikram etmişti. Öyle eski üretim sentetik içkilerden değildi, Leydi'nin gözdesi olan şaraptı. Sarayında her daim ondan içerdi. Altın renkliydi ve adı Saflık Alevi'ydi. Adı tuhaf, farkındayım ama tadı yoğundu ve ne öncesinde ne de sonrasında boğazımdan geçen hiçbir şeye benzemiyordu." {n}Hüzünle burnunu çeken İdira, kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Kusuruma bakma. Muhtemelen önemsizdir. Ne yazık ki bundan başka bir şey bilmiyorum."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
